job.title: Java Software Engineer
job.description: <p>Looking for a Candidate in Ohio or Delaware who is:</p><p><br></p><ul><li>Proficient in Core Java development skills as well as multiple design techniques</li><li>Working proficiency in Core Java development toolset to design, develop, test, deploy, maintain and improve software</li><li>Strong understanding of Agile methodologies with ability to work in at least one of the common frameworks</li><li>Strong understanding of techniques such as Continuous Integration, Continuous Delivery, Test Driven Development, Cloud Development, application resiliency and security</li><li>Proficiency in one or more general purpose programming languages</li><li>Working proficiency in a portion of software engineering disciplines and demonstrates understanding of overall software skills including business analysis, development, testing, deployment, maintenance and improvement of software</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>At this time no Corp to Corp relationships will be considered for this opportunity.</strong></p>
